description.narrative: The Fund will achieve development impact by improving access to equity financing to emerging and mid-sized companies that are expected to create above average employment and accelerate economic growth across the region. The investments will be across a diversity of sectors. The Fund's investments in target companies will range from $5 million to $15 million and will consist predominantly of strategic minority equity stakes, with board representation and shareholder right to influence the strategic direction of the company and conduct of management.

The project involves an investment, not to exceed 20% of total committed capital, in Catalyst Fund I LLC (Catalyst or the Fund). Catalyst is a private equity fund that is seeking capital commitments of US$100 US$125 million to provide support (both financial and management advice through active board participation) to up to 14 mid size companies in the Eastern Africa region by investing between $5 million and $15 million per company.
Catalyst will invest in growth companies with dynamic management to drive growth, regional expansion, consolidation, and performance improvement.

mailing-address.narrative:
Mr. Paul Kavuma Chief Executive Officer Catalyst Principal Partners Purshottam Place, Westlands P.O. Box 1482-00606 Nairobi, Kenya
www.catalystprincipal.com

name.narrative: Catalyst is a Mauritius-domiciled private equity fund. The Manager will also be domiciled in Mauritius with a subsidiary office in Nairobi, Kenya. The Fund aims to invest no more than 35% of total capital in Kenya, no more than 25% each in Uganda and Tanzania (collectively termed Core Region), and opportunistically invest no more than 35% in aggregate in other IDA countries in the region.

activity-description.narrative: A description that qualifies the activity taking place at the location.

sector.narrative: BB - Private Equity/Venture Cap Fund - Regional
